trends: There have been no other sightings in Belchertown
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: October 26,2005 at approximatly 10:00 a.m. we were traveling west bound on route 202 in South Hadely headed toward Holyoke when a matalic reflection of an object about the size of a small car moved at a high rate of spead low in the sky in front of us. Then the reflection quickley dulled and in broad blue sky the whole thing disapeared. It was terrifying and in the direction we were going. Later another driver disclosed that him and his wife also had seen it over Holyoke from route 391. I made a report of it at Holyoke Community Collage s police department. Please contact me so I know it s been loged some where.
